thought: To craft cyan stained glass, I need to first craft cyan dye. To craft cyan dye, I need to craft green dye. To craft green dye, I need to smelt the cactus at slot 28 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 28 to slot 12 with quantity 1
